concept.title: AF PGI 5316.506 Solicitation Provisions and Contract Clauses

li.p: (d)(1) Include the cumulative final date for the total “effective period” of the contract in the blank at the end of FAR clause 52.216-21(f), Requirements to cover the exercise of option periods and the performance of all options included in all future orders.

(e) Include the cumulative final date for the total “effective period” of the contract in the blank at the end of FAR clause 52.216-22(d), Indefinite Quantity to cover the exercise of option periods and the performance of all options included in all future orders.
